## NS.tprint() method

Prints a value or a variable to the Terminal.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tprint(msg: string | number | string[] | number[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  msg | string \| number \| string\[\] \| number\[\] | Value to be printed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
